Package eu.tivian.software

Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.software.Monitor
  • public class Monitor
extends Object
    Assembly language monitor.
    Meant for the CPU debugging.
    Since:
    2019-11-06
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Kania
    See Also:
    SimpleCPU, MOS8501

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static List<String> addressing
      Addressing modes indexed by the opcode.
      private static Pattern asmRegex
      Regex which matches all possible formats of assembly language instruction in the CPU.
      private static Map<Character,​Pattern> commands
      List of all available commands with corresponding regex patterns.
      private static Map<Character,​Integer> conversion
      List of all numeric conversions symbols with corresponding numeric bases.
      private static SimpleCPU cpu
      Stripped-down version of the CPU without need for external signals.
      private static Map<Integer,​String> defaultRoms
      List of ROM images used for default memory loading.
      static String helpStr
      Text with all available commands of this assembly language monitor.
      static List<String> jumping
      Instructions which breaks the flow of the program.
      static List<String> mnemonic
      Mnemonics indexed by the opcode.
      private static BufferedReader reader
      Command-line reader.

      • conversion

        private static final Map<Character,​Integer> conversion
        List of all numeric conversions symbols with corresponding numeric bases.
        • % → binary
        • # → decimal
        • $ → hexadecimal

      • isASCII

        private static boolean isASCII​(char ch)
        Helper function, which tells if the character is within printable range.
        Parameters:
        ch - the character to test
        Returns:
        true if ch ≥ 32 ∧ ch < 127.

      • readLine

        private static String readLine()
        Read one line from command-line console.
        Returns:
        one line of text without line feed

        Peeks into the memory.
        Parameters:
        address - the memory cell index
        Returns:

                         int value)

        value - value to write

      • showMemory

        private static void showMemory​(int from,
                               int to,
                               int width,
                               boolean loop)
        Shows the memory in hexdump format.
        Parameters:
        from - starting position
        to - last position
        width - the number of bytes displayed in one line
        loop - true if the function should show memory until user doesn't enter empty line

        values - the values to write

        private static void walk​(short start)
        Walks through the memory one instruction at the time.
        Parameters:
        start - starting position

      • walk

        private static void walk​(short start,
                         int step)
        Walks through the memory step instructions at the time.
        Parameters:
        start - starting position
        step - number of instructions after which the monitor will wait for user input
